name: Curve Drawing
summary: A CURVE file is a drawing created by Linearity Curve, a vector graphic design program. The drawing a CURVE file contains may consist of shapes, pen strokes, brush strokes, and/or text. Typically, these elements are split into several distinct layers, which can be edited independently of each other.
